value.summary: All four JSON outputs are consistent with the provided report and do not introduce fabricated quantitative results. The numerical values (dayside brightness temperature 342±22 K; epsilon 0.19 +0.23/-0.14; Bond albedo <0.08; 15 µm band depth 96 ppm; likelihood ratio 7.4; CO2-rich pressure scale 0.3–1.0 bar) are correctly transcribed with valid line references (L27–L32).
